here?\""},{"lineNumber":227344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、それしかないよなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that’s the only option, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":227345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえずリーダーのお前は行くとして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, the leader—you’ll go,"},{"lineNumber":227346,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相棒の俺も当然ついて……","translatedEnglishLine":"and naturally, your partner—I’ll come are...\""},{"lineNumber":227348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":227349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、私も行く！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I’ll go too!\""},{"lineNumber":227350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...\""},{"lineNumber":227351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、ここの魔法をどうにか出来ないのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's fault...\""},{"lineNumber":227353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私がなんとかしてくる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll do something about it!\""},{"lineNumber":227354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":227355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Eh?\""},{"lineNumber":227356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That means\""},{"lineNumber":227357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞と一緒に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Together with <Eiru>"},{"lineNumber":227358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　裸で中に入るってことだけど、大丈夫？」","translatedEnglishLine":"to go inside naked, but is that okay?\""},{"lineNumber":227359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":227360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":227361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm!?\""},{"lineNumber":227362,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気に入った！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I like that!"},{"lineNumber":227363,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言うじゃねーか、スシヌ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You really said it, Sushinu!\""},{"lineNumber":227364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃひい！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyahii!?\""},{"lineNumber":227365,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばちーん。","translatedEnglishLine":"*Smack.*"},{"lineNumber":227366,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスが乱暴にスシヌの背を叩いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu roughly slapped Sushinu on the back."},{"lineNumber":227367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大体、俺ぁさっきからイラついてたんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Basically, I've been irritated for a while now."},{"lineNumber":227368,"originalJapaneseLine":"　敵がいんなら裸だろーがどうだろーが","translatedEnglishLine":"If there are enemies, naked or not,"},{"lineNumber":227369,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうだっていいだろーがってな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"it doesn't really matter, does it!?\""},{"lineNumber":227370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":227371,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スシヌも中々覚悟が決まってきたな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sushinu has almost made up his mind!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、入り口まで戻ってきちまったか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, we've ended up back at the entrance..."
"Well then, what should we do now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから一行は色々な道を試したものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, the group tried various paths,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どの道も裸になってしまう魔法がかけられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but every path was cursed with magic that would strip them naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺らの目的はオーブだけなんだから、
どうにかやり過ごせればいいんだけどなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if we can somehow get past this, it would be good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはおそらく難しいだろうね……」
元就、さっきから静かだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari, you've been quiet since a while ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はなんか意見ないの？」
どうしたらいいと思うか、か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re asking what I think we should do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話を！　何も！　聞いていなかった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The story! I didn’t hear anything at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変態が出て来たのは覚えてるぞ！
敵意は感じないので寝てた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn’t feel any hostility, so I just slept!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから状況がよく分からん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So I don’t really understand the situation!
"Motonari is just that kind of guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この迷宮内の奥に行くと裸になるからだなぁ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you go deeper inside this labyrinth, you’ll end up naked—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつ本当に何も話聞いていない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He really hasn’t listened to a single thing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君が元就にあれこれ説明をするのを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Nagata-kun was explaining various things to Motonari,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横目に見ながら、乱義はコホンと咳払いした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi glanced sideways and cleared his throat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この迷宮は少し厄介だね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this labyrinth is a bit troublesome."
<Eiru>, what will you do from here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえずリーダーのお前は行くとして、
相棒の俺も当然ついて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and naturally, your partner—I’ll come along...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、後は中に入るのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, and then going inside are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、ここの魔法をどうにか出来ないのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's my responsibility that I can't do anything about the magic here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸で中に入るってことだけど、大丈夫？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to go inside naked, but is that okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うじゃねーか、スシヌ！」
ザンスが乱暴にスシヌの背を叩いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu roughly slapped Sushinu on the back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大体、俺ぁさっきからイラついてたんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Basically, I've been irritated for a while now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵がいんなら裸だろーがどうだろーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there are enemies, naked or not,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだっていいだろーがってな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't really matter, does it!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌも中々覚悟が決まってきたな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sushinu has almost made up his mind!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, we've ended up back at the entrance..."
"Well then, what should we do now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから一行は色々な道を試したものの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, the group tried various paths,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どの道も裸になってしまう魔法がかけられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but every path was cursed with magic that would strip them naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺らの目的はオーブだけなんだから、
どうにかやり過ごせればいいんだけどなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so if we can somehow get past this, it would be good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはおそらく難しいだろうね……」
元就、さっきから静かだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari, you've been quiet since a while ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はなんか意見ないの？」
どうしたらいいと思うか、か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re asking what I think we should do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話を！　何も！　聞いていなかった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The story! I didn’t hear anything at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変態が出て来たのは覚えてるぞ！
敵意は感じないので寝てた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn’t feel any hostility, so I just slept!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから状況がよく分からん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So I don’t really understand the situation!
"Motonari is just that kind of guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この迷宮内の奥に行くと裸になるからだなぁ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you go deeper inside this labyrinth, you’ll end up naked—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつ本当に何も話聞いていない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He really hasn’t listened to a single thing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君が元就にあれこれ説明をするのを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Nagata-kun was explaining various things to Motonari,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横目に見ながら、乱義はコホンと咳払いした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi glanced sideways and cleared his throat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この迷宮は少し厄介だね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this labyrinth is a bit troublesome."
<Eiru>, what will you do from here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえずリーダーのお前は行くとして、
相棒の俺も当然ついて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and naturally, your partner—I’ll come along...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、後は中に入るのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, and then going inside are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、ここの魔法をどうにか出来ないのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's my responsibility that I can't do anything about the magic here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸で中に入るってことだけど、大丈夫？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to go inside naked, but is that okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うじゃねーか、スシヌ！」
ザンスが乱暴にスシヌの背を叩いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu roughly slapped Sushinu on the back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大体、俺ぁさっきからイラついてたんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Basically, I've been irritated for a while now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵がいんなら裸だろーがどうだろーが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there are enemies, naked or not,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだっていいだろーがってな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't really matter, does it!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌも中々覚悟が決まってきたな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sushinu has almost made up his mind!"
